verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Oh, it's that precious, priceless, powerful, praising
Wonderful life in me
I can climb any mountain
I can walk on top of the sea
I can cast down any stronghold
That this world might have on me
By that precious, priceless, powerful, praising
Wonderful life in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the morning when I arise and get on my knees to pray
It should come as no surprise the devil's got something to say
Words of doubt and words of fear He tries to get me
But in the name of Jesus I just tear his lies to pieces
And the devil just has to flee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now that old devil he won't quit trying to keep me from the light
Walking about like a roaring lion trying to take a bite
Still the Lord gives me the victory so I praise Him more and more.
As I keep abiding, He'll keep on guiding, and there's victory in store.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Con tu poder, valor, loor
Preciosa vida que hay en mí
Puedo subir cada monte
Y andar encima del mar
Puedo vencer cualquier fuerza
que me ate a este yo
con tu poder, valor, loor
preciosa vida que hay en mí.
